function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Globalization and interconnectedness through travel and trade leading to the rapid spread of COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission and difficulty in containment.","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions, quarantine protocols, and international cooperation for disease surveillance and response.","Technologies":"Advancements in contact tracing, real-time monitoring, and international communication platforms.","People":"Global population, travelers, and international business and tourism sectors.","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations, and global regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Sensitivity of regression models to outliers impacting the significance of variables in understanding COVID-19 diffusion.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the impact of socio-spatial factors on disease diffusion.","Mitigation":"Utilize robust statistical methods, consider non-parametric regression approaches, and conduct sensitivity analysis for outlier influence.","Technologies":"Advanced statistical software for outlier detection and robust regression modeling.","People":"Data analysts, statisticians, and researchers in epidemiology and public health.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies, and statistical standards organizations."}]}
